articles.title: Billion-light-year-wide 'bubble of galaxies' discovered - Phys.org
articles.description: Astronomers have discovered the first "bubble of galaxies," an almost unimaginably huge cosmic structure thought to be a fossilized remnant from just after the Big Bang sitting in our galactic backyard.
